titles.title: Be Glad Then Ye Children Of Zion

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be glad then ye children of Zion,
And rejoice in the Lord your God.
Be glad then ye children of Zion,
And rejoice in the Lord your God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He has given the former rain,
And caused it to come down,
And the latter rain in the first month.
With wheat the floor abounds.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The former rain came moderately,
And did not satisfy.
But the oil and the wine of the latter rain,
It never shall run dry.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And I will restore to you the years
That the locusts have destroyed.
In plenty you'll be satisfied,
And praise the Lord your God.
